scripts.install-all: npm i --prefix bigchaindb-network && npm i --prefix composer-network && npm i --prefix rest-api && npm i --prefix web-app
scripts.resetBusinessNetwork: npm run setupStorageDirs && npm run --prefix composer-network resetBusinessNetwork
scripts.setupStorageDirs: mkdir -p rest-api/assets/audits/acquired && mkdir -p rest-api/assets/audits/created && mkdir -p rest-api/assets/certificates/ && rm -rf rest-api/assets/audits/acquired/* rest-api/assets/audits/created/* rest-api/assets/certificates/* && mkdir -p maps && rm -rf maps/* && mkdir -p keys && rm -rf keys/*
scripts.startBusinessNetwork: mkdir -p maps && rm -rf maps/* && npm run --prefix composer-network startBusinessNetwork
